actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the existing investment tax credit for the rehabilitation of existing structures from 10 percent to 25 percent.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the rate of the investment tax credit for the rehabilitation of existing structures from 10 to 25 percent.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the existing investment tax credit for the rehabilitation of existing structures from 10 percent to 25 percent.
